headline: Chelsea Women extend contract of England U-19 defender Cerys Brown
summary: Chelsea have taken the option to extend the contract of England U-19 defender Cerys Brown ahead of the 2024/25 campaign. The full back who has just turned 19, signed her first professional contract with Chelsea […]

headline: Katie Wilkinson joins Rangers Women after leaving Saints
summary: Rangers FC have signed 29-year-old forward Katie Wilkinson from Barclays Women’s Championship side Southampton on a two-year deal. Player’s Player of the Season and also top goalscorer last season, Wilkinson follows Laura Rafferty in joining Rangers […]

headline: San Diego Wave part ways with head coach Casey Stoney
summary: NWSL side San Diego Wave have brought to an end Casey Stoney’s three-year tenure as the club’s first head coach. Paul Buckle takes charge as interim head coach, with the club ninth in the 14-team […]

headline: Birmingham City Women sign England U-19 international Ava Baker
summary: Birmingham City have signed 18-year-old England youth international Ava Baker from Leicester City on a three-year contract. The attacking player was a prolific goalscorer for England U-17s before progressing into the U-19s and the teenager […]

headline: Young Lionesses learn group opponents at FIFA Women’s U-17 World Cup
summary: England have been grouped with North Korea, Mexico and Kenya at the 2024 FIFA U17 Women’s World Cup in the Dominican Republic. Reigning champions Spain take on USA, South Korea and Colombia in Group B. […]

headline: Sion Swifts win seven-goal thriller to lead NIWFA Championship
summary: Sion Swifts are new leaders in the NIWFA Championship, recovering from two goals down to win 4-3 at Bangor. Lydia Clarke and Amanda Morton fired the Seasiders into the two-goal lead but Rachel Barnaby calmly […]
